wikipedia_page.main: Charles Creswell (10 March 1813 – 22 November 1882) was an English cricketer who played first-class cricket from 1836 to 1843.  Mainly associated with Nottinghamshire, he made 12 known appearances in first-class matches.  He represented the North in the North v. South series.

response: * 2 – Alfred Mynn, Bartholomew Good, Charles Creswell, Francis Fenner, George Rothera, Jem Broadbridge, Richard Mills, Tom Adams, William Hillyer
